title: Ranked Down?
body: I know theres the log in issues going on, but is ranked down too? its not giving me an option to queue up for ranked?

replies.body: Ranked was taken down due to the login issues. Once those were fixed, ranked should have automatically come back up as well! Let me know if you still can't queue up for ranked.
I'm having this same issue. Only blind and Draft available. Thought I was banned from ranked for a moment. lol
